@CryptosR_Us Repurposing surplus energy for Bitcoin mining not only reduces waste but also showcases how crypto can align with sustainable infrastructure. Turning potential energy loss into economic and community value—this is the kind of future-forward thinking we need. 💡⚡

@Dr_Gingerballs 1/2 without mining, gold would be truly limited like bitcoin. Every year gold miners inflate gold by ~3%.  Currently, the bitcoin inflation rate is ~0.83%/year and it will be half of this in 3 years and so on until year 2140 when the last bitcoin will be mined.

#Web3Journey #zkSync #Layer2 #BlockchainDev #MetaMask #SmartContracts #TestnetVibes#myjourney #WebDev #blockchainbabe

At first, I got an error on the bridge page, but after refreshing, everything worked smoothly. 🔁✅
Gotta love testnet life 😂x

I also started learning about the zkSync Hardhat plugin, which helps you deploy smart contracts directly to zkSync.

I used my MetaMask wallet to bridge assets from Ethereum Sepolia Testnet to zkSync Sepolia.
A bridge is a tool that lets you move tokens or data from one blockchain network to another. Think of it like a digital “road” connecting two different chains. 🌉
zkSync is a Layer 2 rollup built to scale Ethereum with faster and cheaper transactions. 🚀

Day 11 of My Blockchain Journey
Today, I successfully bridged assets from the Ethereum Sepolia Testnet to the zkSync Sepolia Testnet using my MetaMask wallet 🔐🌉. https://t.co/sWhiRdNJVq

Why is this cool?

Saves money for devs building zk apps.

Works with ALL types of ZK tech (zkEVM, zkVM, STARKs etc)

Backed by big names like ZKsync, Scroll, Aztec, Polygon & a16z
